Welcome to DC Repairs!
We are Farm Machinery Specialists
Find out more!

Services

Machinery Repair

We have a proven track record in Machinery repair. We provide best in class diagnostics. We also provide a full preventative maintenance examination

Breakdown Assistance

Rail Hail or Snow we provide breakdown assistance across North Tipperary and Offaly.

Vintage Tractor Restoration

We restore vintage tractors to their former glory with an attention to detail. We treat your beloved tractor like it is our own!

About

DC Repairs.

  • 1999 - 2024

    Derick has spent years honing his craft working on all types of vehicles and machinery.

  • 2024

    Opened in 2024

    After 25 years of experience Derick took the leap and opened DC Repairs.

  • 2025

    The business has been a huge success with the team opening their own workshop to keep up with demand!

  • 2025 and Beyond

    DC Repairs has aspirations to continue expansion
